value.title: Zoox CEO on Deal With Amazon to Make Self-Driving, Electric Cars
value.excerpt: Aicha Evans, CEO of Zoox Inc, discusses working under Amazon.com Inc. and the progress of their self-driving, electric shuttles. She also shares her experience working in a predominately white male industry.

value.title: Waymo simulated real-world crashes to prove its self-driving cars can prevent deaths
value.excerpt: In a bid to prove that its robot drivers are safer than humans, Waymo simulated dozens of real-world fatal crashes that took place in Arizona over nearly a decade. The Google spinoff discovered that replacing either vehicle in a two-car crash with its robot-guided minivans would nearly eliminate all deaths,

value.title: Robotics division of Uber's Postmates spins out into new company
value.excerpt: The robotics unit of Postmates, a delivery startup that ride-hailing firm Uber Technologies acquired last year, has spun off into a new company called Serve Robotics, the company said on Tuesday.

value.excerpt: Gatik, a company developing autonomous driving technology for short-haul logistics, has raised $9 million in funding.

value.title: Self-driving startup Aeva hires Waymo, Apple veteran to oversee supply chain
value.excerpt: Self-driving sensor startup Aeva Inc, founded by two Apple Inc alumni, has hired another former Apple executive to oversee manufacturing and supply chain operations ahead of an expected deal to become a public company later this month.

value.title: AWS reorganizes DeepRacer League to encourage more newbies
value.excerpt: AWS launched the DeepRacer League in 2018 as a fun way to teach developers machine learning, and it’s been building on the idea ever since. Today, it announced the latest league season with two divisions: Open and Pro.

value.title: Americans Want Self-Driving Cars, But Want Safety First

value.title: COMMENTARY: How robotics are changing jobs in Canada
value.excerpt: One widely cited study estimates that 47 per cent of jobs in the United States are at risk of being replaced by robots and artificial intelligence. Read more: The 5-minute shopping spree.

value.title: Driverless bus hits streets in southern Spain
value.excerpt: A new driverless electric bus has begun operating in the southern Spanish city of Malaga, in a project presented as a first in Europe.

value.title: Aurora acquires a second lidar company in push to bring self-driving trucks to the road
value.excerpt: Aurora, the autonomous vehicle company that recently closed its acquisition of Uber’s self-driving subsidiary, has snapped up another startup.  This time, Aurora is buying OURS Technology, the second lidar startup it has acquired in less than two years.

value.title: Aurora Buys Chip Startup To Cut Laser Lidar Costs For Robot Cars And Trucks
value.excerpt: The self-driving tech developer is acquiring Silicon Valley startup OURS Technology to integrate its lidar sensor into a single chip.
